column4: Hi, I was trying to wipe out the partitions of a second hard drive that had had linux installed on it.... But I accidentally wiped out the swap partition on my main hard drive (dual boot, Ubuntu and Win XP).  Now I can't boot from windows... it says hal.dll missing or corrupt...   probably wiped out my boot.ini file?
are you sure you didn't whack your windows system partition?
ah OK.  In that case, try doing a repair install of windows.  sounds like you lost the MBR
